name: Out Of The Shadows
description:
100 years after the great disasters of 2020 the United States of America has collapsed. Biff Spicoli, one of the few remaining American survivors is on a personal journey to expose the corrupt federation that is oppressing the remaining survivors.

Journey with Biff to complete his adventure.

**This is a submission for the $104 Adventure Game Jam where you have to create a classic style Adventure game using the theme of "A Delusion"**
